commons.slogan_full: Let your community grow, the bright way

features.objectives_desc: Flora provides pre-defined objectives but also gives you the ability to create custom ones, keeping your community busy with whatever fits best!
features.reputation_desc: Having Flora on your guild for a while also ensures to new users you're the real deal! The more time passes, the more public reputation you gain.
features.leaderboards_desc: Use all the tools Flora provides to the extreme! Give out prizes to top users, or even organize events at the end of an objective.

team.explenation: Although Flora itself is maintained by one developer, the landing page was made with the help of multiple people. The website itself was built with React and Tailwind.

cookies.explenation: This website uses cookies to store basic information, such as user settings.
